content.body: ljharb: What's your planned direction for Error.stacks? I'm trying to prep for our agenda review and a lack of slides has me wondering what's changed
content.formatted_body: ljharb: What's your planned direction for Error.stacks? I'm trying to prep for our agenda review and a lack of slides has me wondering what's changed

content.body: nothing’s changed with the proposal. I’m hoping that the “boil the ocean” requirement won’t still exist
